text:
How can we update any data to hubdb using serverless function.
Eg = I need to update a hubdb data .when user add some data in page level.
You'll have to use the hubDB API's <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/hubdb/hubdb_overview>

Hello all , I am unable to pass parameters for get and body for post .
Could you please check what am i doing wrong here?
Although i am not getting any error in response .

the params that are added to that map in the serverless function refer to the query params in the request URL. so you would need to do something like `<http://domain.com/_hcms/api/my/endpoint?name=hello|domain.com/_hcms/api/my/endpoint?name=hello>`
maybe you'd find these utils useful: <https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/URLSearchParams#examples>
<@UEKMY50SU> yesterday i was trying that and it was not working but now its working could you please tell me how can i send post data .
